ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities include updates to news posts, such as fixing duplicate wording on holidays and adding new news. Additionally, there have been contributions to lazer mod articles, including adding new articles, standardizing mod fields, and reformatting key mod details. ppy/osu.summary: A recent update implemented the ability to mark a beatmap as played, which was merged through a pull request. This new feature is expected to enhance the user experience within the osu platform.
